content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received a message to browse the AllTrails website for the Brno Reservoir Loop trail and determine its difficulty level. The website had permanently moved to https://www.alltrails.com, which I accessed successfully. I searched for the trail and found that its difficulty level is rated as moderate.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='your computer', content='Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: Error: No text to summarize\n\nLinks: []', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "Brno Reservoir Loop trail difficulty level"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.alltrails.com/czech-republic/south-moravian/brno", "https://www.gotobrno.cz/en/explore-brno/go-to-brnos-educational-trails/", "https://www.alltrails.com/en-gb/czech-republic/south-moravian/brno", "https://www.gotobrno.cz/en/place/brno-reservoir/", "https://www.mainetrailfinder.com/trails/trail/rotary-centennial-trail", "https://www.tripadvisor.com/Attraction_Review-g274714-d6701144-Reviews-Brno_Dam-Brno_South_Moravian_Region_Moravia.html", "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brno", "https://www.tripsavvy.com/top-things-to-do-in-brno-czech-republic-5112855"]', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.alltrails.com/czech-republic/south-moravian/brno", "question": "What factors affect the difficulty level of the Brno Reservoir Loop trail?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: Error: No text to summarize\n\nLinks: []', type='action_result')]
"""
